channel.title: math.GN updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.GN updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: On the openness of the idempotent barycenter map related to a t-norm
item.description: arXiv:2403.12708v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: We demonstrate that the idempotent barycenter map, associated with a t-norm $\ast$, is open if and only if the map of max-$\ast$ convex combination is open. As a corollary, we deduce that the idempotent barycenter map is open for spaces of idempotent measures associated with any t-norm $\ast$. Nevertheless, we illustrate that the characteristics of the idempotent barycenter map, in general, depend on the specific t-norm being employed.
item.dc:creator: Dawid Krasi\'nski, Taras Radul
